data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Ad Daqahliyah, Egypt today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ad Daqahliyah, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Ad Daqahliyah. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 22 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Ad Daqahliyah.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Ad Daqahliyah.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Adyghe people.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ad Daqahliyah.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Ad Daqahliyah, Egypt to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ad Daqahliyah, Egypt has a population of 5,818,400.

We estimate Ad Daqahliyah has 258,804 people who might know Jesus, 505,134 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,054,462 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Ad Daqahliyah access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
